enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Prerequisite: Students must have completed the entire sequence of BIOL_SCI 215, 217, 219, 220, 221, 222, and 308 to register for this course.
title: WCAS BIOL_SCI 355-0-1 Immunobiology

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course examines the structure and functioning of the vertebrate immune system. This amazingly flexible system constitutes an evolutionary adaptation that allows individual animals to ward off microbial infections. We will examine: Characteristics of host resistance, immune response , hypersensitivity, antigens, antibodies.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
The Immune System, 4th Ed., by Peter Parham Published by Garland
ISBN: 10:081534466 x ISBN: 13: 978-0815344667

subject: BIOL_SCI
